abstract: Cognos, Canada’s biggest software company, said it planned to buy Applix, of Westborough, Mass., for $339 million to expand in financial performance management. The deal comes as many software companies, such as Oracle and Business Objects, have been making acquisitions to boost their performance-management offerings.
